title: Fun With DAGs
text:
What is this about
This is the companion to the FunWithDAGs Youtube channel. Here you will find more complete explanations for each one of the videos.


Causal Inference for Data Science Book
You can find my book “Causal Inference for Data Science” [here]https://www.manning.com/books/causal-inference-for-data-science.

title: 1  Adjustment Formula
text:
The adjustment formula is
\[P(Y=1|do(X:=1)) = \sum_z P(Y=1|X=1, Z=z)P(Z)\]
See Pearl (2000) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Pearl, Judea. 2000. Causality: Models, Reasoning, and Inference. Cambridge University Press.

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.

text:
